text: How deputy PM @cafreeland is handling the #COVID19 crisis -- with some "therapy" from @fordnation. My new interview/profile online now in @TorontoStar: https://t.co/CgbTEkYLHq #cdnpoli

urls.title: ‘He’s my therapist’: How Chrystia Freeland and Doug Ford forged an unlikely friendship in the fight against COVID-19
urls.description: Ottawa’s point person on the pandemic response is getting support from a premier who used to be one of her government’s fiercest critics, Susan Delacourt writes.
